attributes.action: Put a ban on factory farming
attributes.additional_details:
The Government need to listen to the majority of people who do not want these factory farming anymore.

This is not farming,this is violence and cruelty.

Which is affecting us all,our health,Animals welfare and the planet health.
attributes.background:
Factory farming can be a nest for diseases and pandemics and use of antibiotics to control is causing problems for the Animals and people.

They contribute to climate change

departments.name: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
